mapper.select: SELECT co.order_num, co.order_purchase_date, b.book_name, b.book_thumbnail_changed, b.book_isbn, cod.order_detail_price, CASE WHEN pr.request_status = '01' THEN '주문완료' WHEN pr.request_status = '02' THEN '취소요청' WHEN pr.request_status = '03' THEN '교환요청' WHEN pr.request_status = '04' THEN '반품요청' WHEN pr.request_status = '05' THEN '취소완료' WHEN pr.request_status = '06' THEN '교환완료' WHEN pr.request_status = '07' THEN '반품완료' WHEN pr.request_status = '08' THEN '처리불가' END AS request_status, pr.request_complete_qty FROM product_request pr LEFT JOIN customer_order_details cod ON pr.order_detail_num = cod.order_detail_num LEFT JOIN customer_orders co ON co.order_num = cod.order_num LEFT JOIN books b ON cod.book_isbn = b.book_isbn WHERE co.order_num = #{orderNum} AND cod.order_detail_status IN ( '02', '05' )
